Detailed Description

Date:
08-20-2001
Author:
Eric Crahen
Version:
1.0

This class implements Shape, and consists of a series of straight-line segments.

It allows segements to be added and split quickly, and is very efficent, minimizing the number of new objects created for most frequently used operations.

Segment distance methods should be updated as well as the relativeCCW methods for a complete PolyLine2D implementation
